flawed_nl_solution:
Hansel makes $30000 and received a 10% raise so his raise is 30000*0.1 = $3000
Hansel now makes 30000+ 3000 = $<<30000+3000=33000>>33000 a year
Gretel makes $30000 and received a 15% raise so her raise is 30000*0.15 = $45000
Gretel now makes 30000+45000 = $<<30000+45000=75000>>75000 a year
If Gretel makes $75000 a year and Hansel makes $33000 then Gretel makes 75000-33000 = $<<75000-33000=42000>>42000 more a year than Hansel

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4500.0, not 45000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
